page.title: 06Hexton Houses
page.content: There are{51 houses}in{Hexton.}37 belong to the Hexton Manor Estate and the rest are privately owned. Heidi lives in a house incorporating a cottage which is 400 years old. An extension is being added carefully to enhance the old building. Hexton is a {conservation area}so the buildings must be carefully preserved. One of the oldest residents was born in a village cottage. When she married she moved to the cottage next door where she lives still.{Hexton Manor}is a large country house with 10 bedrooms. Every Christmas the school children go there to a party. We have a good feast and Father Christmas brings us presents.
